hero.title: The Minimal
hero.subtitle: is Coming Soon
hero.description: We're building the simple project management solution your team has been waiting for. Clean interface, powerful features, seamless collaboration - all launching soon.

features.title: What's Coming in
features.description: Get a sneak peek at the powerful features we're crafting for launch day

card_ui.title: Easy-to-use minimal UI
card_ui.description: Focus on your projects, not on complex software. Our clean interface makes management intuitive and effortless.

card_workspaces.title: Multi-workspace support
card_workspaces.description: Seamlessly manage multiple teams, clients, or projects from a single account, keeping everything organized.

card_messaging.title: Built-in messaging applications
card_messaging.description: Communicate with your team directly within your workspaces to keep all project discussions in one place.

card_assignments.title: Workspace member assignments and management
card_assignments.description: Easily add, manage, and assign tasks to team members within each workspace for clear responsibilities.

timeline.title: Coming Soon!
timeline.description: We are in the final stages of development and testing. Get ready for the launch of The Management Workspace with advanced reporting, custom workflows, and integrations with your favorite tools.

card_reporting.title: Advanced Reporting
card_reporting.description: Deep insights into team performance, project metrics, and productivity analytics to help you make data-driven decisions.

card_workflows.title: Custom Workflows
card_workflows.description: Design and automate workflows that match your unique business processes, from simple task flows to complex project pipelines.
